valueCodeableConcept.text: Pharmacodynamics (PD): Change From Baseline in Maximal Blood Glucose (BGmax) of Glucagon Nasal Powder and Glucagon Hydrochloride Intramuscular (IM)

timing.text: Pre-dose, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 40, 50, 60, 90, 120, 240 minutes after each glucagon administration

title: Pharmacodynamics (PD): Change From Baseline in Maximal Blood Glucose (BGmax) of Glucagon Nasal Powder and Glucagon Hydrochloride Intramuscular (IM) (NCT03421379)
description: PD assessment measured the change from Baseline in maximal blood glucose (BGmax) of Glucagon Nasal Powder and Glucagon Hydrochloride intramuscular (IM).
